metadata.title: CVE-2024-10463 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Video frames could have been leaked between origins in some situations.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 132, Firefox ESR < 128.4, Firefox ESR< 115.17, Thunderbird < 128.4, and Thunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
